content:
The provided code chunk defines a set of options for a widget, including callbacks and their data handling. It fits within a class definition where widget options are being set up, specifically in the __init__ method of a ValuatorGroupPanel or similar component.

**Succinct Context:**

The code chunk is part of the initialization process for defining widget options in a ValuatorGroupPanel, specifying callbacks and related data handling parameters.

('numDigits',       2,                      self._setNumDigits),
            # The command to be executed when one of the floaters is updated
            ('command',         None,                   self._setCommand),
            # Callbacks to execute when updating widget's value
            ('preCallback',       None,                 self._setPreCallback),
            ('postCallback',      None,                 self._setPostCallback),
            # Extra data to be passed to callback function, needs to be a list
            ('callbackData',      [],                   self._setCallbackData),
            # Destroy or withdraw
            ('fDestroy',        0,                      INITOPT)
        )
        self.defineoptions(kw, optiondefs)
